text:
City Seasons Muscat Wins “Best Family-Oriented Hotel” Title
City Seasons hotel in Muscat has just been awarded “Best Family-Oriented Hotel” by the Arab Center for Tourism Media. The annual event, in its 5th edition, was held in Muscat under the patronage of H.E. Ahmed Bin Nasser Al Mehrzi, Omani Minister of Tourism. Up to 18 categories of persons and bodies in the Arab Tourism and Hospitality industries received accolades for Christian Palacin, general manager of City Seasons Muscat said; “We are very proud and grateful to be awarded such a prestigious title. At City Seasons we have always strived to offer a comfortable stay to all our travelers, especially to family vacationers which have acknowledged us as a sure and friendly choice
The criteria for the title included facilities for family with young children i.e. secured play area, pool and swimming accessories, mother & child corners, special kids meals in room service, cribs, baby monitors and a variety of items to make the stay secure and comfortable.
Sheikh Ahmed Musallam Bin Ham, Vice-President and founder of City Seasons Hotels was presented at the same ceremony, with an award for his continuing contribution to the hospitality sector.
Sheikh Ahmed said:” We are thankful and pleased with this award; City Seasons Hotels have wonderful properties in Oman and UAE to cater to international travelers but mainly to Arab families with world-class service, while providing unwavering level of comfort, service and leisure’.
“It has always been a cornerstone in our understanding of cordiality and the Arabian hospitality’, he The Arab Center for Tourism Media through this initiative is highlighting the activities and individual efforts as well as workers in the tourism sector throughout the Arab world, with the aim to attract the limelight to the Arab countries’ touristic sites including the cultural ones and heritage.
Source:- City Seasons Hotel
